title: iShares Core S&P Small-Cap Breaks Above 200-Day Moving Average - Bullish for IJR - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of the iShares Core S&P Small-Cap ETF (Symbol: IJR) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $76.64, changing hands as high as $77.39 per share. iShares Core S&P Small-Cap shares are currently trading up about 2.6% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of IJR shares, versus its 200 day moving average:
